term.name: authenticator
term.definition: The entity that authenticates (in this case, Mufact).

term.name: site
term.definition: The entity offering a service that should be authenticated to.

term.name: site service
term.definition: The service that the site provides (and that the authenticator should authenticate for).

term.name: site credentials
term.definition: The information that the site uses to authenticate itself to the authenticator.

term.name: user
term.definition: The individual who uses the site service.

term.name: device
term.definition: The item the user utilizes to authenticate to the site via the authenticator.

term.name: authenticator key
term.definition: The key pair that the authenticator uses to encrypt all communications with the device.

term.name: authenticator super key
term.definition: The key pair that the authenticator uses to exclusively encrypt the new authenticator keys.

term.name: device key
term.definition: The key pair that the device uses to encrypt all communications with the authenticator

term.name: authentication request
term.definition: A request from the authenticator initiated by the site to authenticate the user to the site service.

term.name: authentication prompt
term.definition: The dialog the user sees on the device that allows them to initiate an authentication response in response to an authentication request.

term.name: authentication ressponse
term.definition: The response that the user makes to the authentication request (i.e. allow, deny, expire).

term.name: authenticator panel
term.definition: The interface that the authenticator provides directly to the user to allow them to see their authentication history.

term.name: user authentication history
term.definition: The collection of all authentication requests and corresponding authentication responses for a user.

term.name: site authentication history
term.definition: The collection of all authentication requests and corresponding authentication responses for a site (will likely be quite long)).

term.name: request id
term.definition: A unique identifier for an authentication request.

term.name: site id
term.definition: A unique identifier for a site (viewed by the user).

term.name: timestamp
term.definition: Approx. number of seconds since midnight 1 Jan 1970 UTC.

term.name: request core
term.definition: The collection of the request id, timestamp, site id, request core type id, and any additional information (as implied by the request core type id).

term.name: request bundle
term.definition: The request core and the authenticator key generated signature of the request core all encrypted with the device key.

term.name: response core
term.definition: The collection of the request id, timestamp, response value, response core type id, and any additional information (as implied by the response core type id).

term.name: response value
term.definition: Literally allow, deny, or expire.

term.name: response bundle
term.definition: The response core and the device key generated signature of the response core all encrypted with the authenticator key.
